   22: -module(ssh_sftp_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -export([
   25:          suite/0,
   26:          all/0,
   27:          groups/0,
   28:          init_per_suite/1,
   29:          end_per_suite/1,
   30:          init_per_group/2,
   31:          end_per_group/2,
   32:          init_per_testcase/2,
   33:          end_per_testcase/2
   34:         ]).
   35: 
   36: -export([
   37:          ascii_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar/1,
   38:          ascii_filename_unicode_contents_to_tar/1,
   39:          async_read/1,
   40:          async_write/1,
   41:          big_file_to_tar/1,
   42:          binaries_to_tar/1,
   43:          block_size_16_crypto_tar/1,
   44:          block_size_1_crypto_tar/1,
   45:          create_empty_tar/1,
   46:          directory_to_tar/1,
   47:          file_owner_access/1,
   48:          files_chunked_to_tar/1,
   49:          files_to_tar/1,
   50:          links/1,
   51:          mk_rm_dir/1,
   52:          null_crypto_tar/1,
   53:          open_close_dir/1,
   54:          open_close_file/1,
   55:          pos_read/1,
   56:          pos_write/1,
   57:          position/1,
   58:          read_6GB/1,
   59:          read_crypto_tar/1,
   60:          read_dir/1,
   61:          read_file/1,
   62:          read_null_crypto_tar/1,
   63:          read_tar/1,
   64:          remove_file/1,
   65:          rename_file/1,
   66:          retrieve_attributes/1,
   67:          set_attributes/1,
   68:          sftp_nonexistent_subsystem/1,
   69:          sftp_read_big_file/1,
   70:          simple_crypto_tar_big/1,
   71:          simple_crypto_tar_small/1,
   72:          start_channel_sock/1,
   73:          stuff/1,
   74:          unicode_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar/1,
   75:          unstuff/1,
   76:          version_option/1,
   77:          write_big_file/1,
   78:          write_file/1,
   79:          write_file_iolist/1
   80:         ]).
   81: 
   82: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   83: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   84: -include("ssh_test_lib.hrl").
   85: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   86: 
   87: %% Default timetrap timeout
   88: -define(default_timeout, test_server:minutes(0.5)).
   89: 
   90: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   91: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   92: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   93: 
   94: suite() ->
   95:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   96:      {timetrap,{seconds,20}}].
   97: 
   98: all() -> 
   99:     [{group, not_unicode},
  100:      {group, unicode}
  101:     ].
  102: 
  103: 
  104: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  105:     ?CHECK_CRYPTO(
  106:        begin
  107: 	   ct:log("file:native_name_encoding() = ~p,~nio:getopts() = ~p",
  108: 		  [file:native_name_encoding(),io:getopts()]),
  109: 	   ssh:start(),
  110: 	   Config
  111:        end).
  112: 
  113: end_per_suite(_onfig) ->
  114:     ssh:stop().
  115: 
  116: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  117: groups() -> 
  118:     [{not_unicode, [], [{group,erlang_server},
  119: 			{group,openssh_server},
  120: 			{group,big_recvpkt_size},
  121: 			sftp_nonexistent_subsystem]},
  122: 
  123:      {unicode, [], [{group,erlang_server},
  124: 		    {group,openssh_server},
  125:                     read_6GB,
  126: 		    sftp_nonexistent_subsystem
  127:                    ]},
  128: 
  129:      {big_recvpkt_size, [], [{group,erlang_server},
  130: 			     {group,openssh_server}]},
  131: 
  132:      {erlang_server, [], [{group,write_read_tests},
  133: 			  version_option,
  134: 			  {group,remote_tar}]},
  135: 
  136:      {openssh_server, [], [{group,write_read_tests},
  137: 			   {group,remote_tar}]},
  138: 
  139:      {remote_tar, [], [create_empty_tar, 
  140: 		       ascii_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar,
  141: 		       ascii_filename_unicode_contents_to_tar,
  142: 		       unicode_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar,
  143: 		       files_to_tar,
  144: 		       big_file_to_tar, files_chunked_to_tar,
  145: 		       directory_to_tar, binaries_to_tar, null_crypto_tar, 
  146: 		       simple_crypto_tar_small, simple_crypto_tar_big,
  147: 		       read_tar, read_null_crypto_tar, read_crypto_tar, 
  148: 		       block_size_1_crypto_tar, block_size_16_crypto_tar
  149: 		      ]},
  150: 
  151:      {write_read_tests, [], [open_close_file, open_close_dir, read_file, read_dir,
  152: 			     write_file, write_file_iolist, write_big_file, sftp_read_big_file,
  153: 			     rename_file, mk_rm_dir, remove_file, links,
  154: 			     retrieve_attributes, set_attributes, file_owner_access, async_read,
  155: 			     async_write, position, pos_read, pos_write,
  156: 			     start_channel_sock
  157: 			    ]}
  158:     ].
  159: 
  160: init_per_group(not_unicode, Config) ->
  161:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  162:     {ok,TestDataDir} =
  163:         make_data_sub_dir(Config, "test_data", "test_data_not_unicode"),
  164:     [{user, "Alladin"},
  165:      {passwd, "Sesame"},
  166:      {data, <<"Hello world!">>},
  167:      {data_pos, ["Hej ","hopp"]},
  168:      {filename,     "sftp.txt"},
  169:      {testfile,     "test.txt"},
  170:      {linktest,     "link_test.txt"},
  171:      {tar_filename, "sftp_tar_test.tar"},
  172:      {tar_F1_txt,   "f1.txt"},
  173:      {datadir_tar, TestDataDir}
  174:      | Config];
  175: 
  176: init_per_group(unicode, Config) ->
  177:     case have_unicode_support() of
  178: 	true ->
  179: 	    ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  180:             {ok,TestDataDir} =
  181:                 make_data_sub_dir(Config, "test_data", "test_data_高兴_unicöde"),
  182:             populate_non_unicode(TestDataDir),
  183: 	    NewConfig =
  184: 		[{user, "åke高兴"},
  185: 		 {passwd, "ärlig日本じん"},
  186:                  {data, "foobar å 一二三四いちにさんち"},
  187:                  {data_pos, ["中","国"]},
  188: 		 {filename,     "sftp瑞点.txt"},
  189: 		 {testfile,     "testハンス.txt"},
  190: 		 {linktest,     "link_test語.txt"},
  191: 		 {tar_filename, "sftp_tar_test一二三.tar"},
  192: 		 {tar_F1_txt,   "F一.txt"},
  193: 		 {tar_F3_txt,   "f3.txt"},
  194: 		 {tar_F4_txt,   "g四.txt"},
  195: 		 {datadir_tar, TestDataDir}
  196: 		 | Config %% lists:foldl(fun(K,Cf) -> lists:keydelete(K,1,Cf) end,
  197: 			  %%      Config,
  198: 			  %%      [user, passwd, data,
  199: 			  %%       filename, testfile, linktest,
  200: 			  %%       tar_filename, tar_F1_txt, datadir_tar
  201: 			  %%      ]
  202:                           %%     )
  203: 		],
  204: 	    FN = fn(proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt,NewConfig), NewConfig),
  205: 	    case catch file:read_file(FN) of
  206: 		{ok,FN_contents} ->
  207: 		    ct:log("Readable file:read_file(~tp) ->~n~tp",[FN,FN_contents]),
  208: 		    NewConfig;
  209: 		Other ->
  210: 		    ct:log("Unreadable file:read_file(~tp) ->~n~p",[FN,Other]),
  211: 		    {skip, "Not unicode file reading"}
  212: 	    end;
  213: 
  214: 	_ ->
  215: 	    {skip, "Not unicode file encoding"}
  216:     end;
  217: 
  218: init_per_group(big_recvpkt_size, Config) ->
  219:     [{pkt_sz,123456} | Config];
  220: 
  221: init_per_group(erlang_server, Config) ->
  222:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  223:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  224:     SysDir =  proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  225:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  226:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  227:     Sftpd = {_, HostX, PortX} =
  228: 	ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  229: 			     {user_dir, PrivDir},
  230: 			     {user_passwords,
  231: 			      [{User, Passwd}]}]),
  232:     [{peer, {fmt_host(HostX),PortX}}, {group, erlang_server}, {sftpd, Sftpd} | Config];
  233: 
  234: init_per_group(openssh_server, Config) ->
  235:     verify_openssh(Config);
  236: 
  237: init_per_group(remote_tar, Config) ->
  238:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  239:     {Host,Port} =  proplists:get_value(peer, Config),
  240:     ct:log("Server (~p) at ~p:~p",[proplists:get_value(group,Config),Host,Port]),
  241:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  242:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  243:     Connection =
  244: 	case proplists:get_value(group, Config) of
  245: 	    erlang_server ->
  246: 		ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port,
  247: 			    [{user, User},
  248: 			     {password, Passwd},
  249: 			     {user_interaction, false},
  250: 			     {silently_accept_hosts, true}]);
  251: 	    openssh_server ->
  252: 		ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port,
  253: 			    [{user_interaction, false},
  254: 			     {silently_accept_hosts, true}])
  255: 	end,
  256:     [{remote_tar, true}, 
  257:      {connection, Connection} | Config];
  258: 
  259: init_per_group(write_read_tests, Config) ->
  260:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  261:     Config.
  262: 
  263: grps(Config) ->
  264:     proplists:get_all_values(
  265:       name, 
  266:       lists:flatten([proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties,Config,[]),
  267: 		     proplists:get_value(tc_group_path,Config,[])])).
  268: 
  269: end_per_group(erlang_server, Config) ->
  270:     ct:comment("End ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  271:     Config;
  272: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
  273:     ct:comment("End ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  274:     Config.
  275: 
  276: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  277: init_per_testcase(read_6GB, Config) ->
  278:     case verify_openssh(Config) of
  279:         Result = {skip, _} ->
  280:             Result;
  281:         _ ->
  282:             case {os:type(), erlang:system_info(system_architecture)} of
  283:                 {{win32, _}, _} ->
  284:                     {skip, "/dev/zero not available on Windows"};
  285:                 {_, "aarch64"} ->
  286:                     {skip, "machine too slow for test"};
  287:                 _ ->
  288:                     init_per_testcase(read_6GB_prepare_openssh_server, Config)
  289:             end
  290:     end;
  291: init_per_testcase(sftp_nonexistent_subsystem, Config) ->
  292:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  293:     SysDir =  proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  294:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  295:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  296:     Sftpd = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  297: 				 {user_dir, PrivDir},
  298: 				 {subsystems, []},
  299: 				 {user_passwords,
  300: 				  [{User, Passwd}]}
  301: 				]),
  302:     [{sftpd, Sftpd} | Config];
  303: init_per_testcase(version_option, Config0) ->
  304:     Config = prepare(Config0),
  305:     TmpConfig0 = lists:keydelete(watchdog, 1, Config),
  306:     TmpConfig = lists:keydelete(sftp, 1, TmpConfig0),
  307:     Dog = ct:timetrap(?default_timeout),
  308:     {_,Host, Port} =  proplists:get_value(sftpd, Config),
  309:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  310:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  311:     {ok, ChannelPid, Connection}  = 
  312: 	ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host, Port,
  313: 			       [{sftp_vsn, 3},
  314: 				{user, User},
  315: 				{password, Passwd},
  316: 				{user_interaction, false},
  317: 				{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  318:                                 {save_accepted_host, false}
  319:                                ]),
  320:     Sftp = {ChannelPid, Connection},
  321:     [{sftp,Sftp}, {watchdog, Dog} | TmpConfig];
  322: init_per_testcase(Case, Config00) ->
  323:     Config0 = prepare(Config00),
  324:     Config1 = lists:keydelete(watchdog, 1, Config0),
  325:     Config2 = lists:keydelete(sftp, 1, Config1),
  326:     Dog = ct:timetrap(2 * ?default_timeout),
  327:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config0),
  328:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config0),
  329:     PktSzOpt = case proplists:get_value(pkt_sz, Config0) of
  330: 		   undefined -> [];
  331: 		   Sz -> [{packet_size,Sz}]
  332: 	       end,
  333:     PrepareOpenSSHServer =
  334:         fun() ->
  335:                 Host = ssh_test_lib:hostname(),
  336:         	{ok, ChannelPid, Connection} =
  337:         	    ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host,
  338:         				   [{user_interaction, false},
  339:         				    {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  340:                                             {save_accepted_host, false}
  341:                                            | PktSzOpt
  342:         				   ]),
  343:         	Sftp = {ChannelPid, Connection},
  344:         	[{sftp, Sftp}, {watchdog, Dog} | Config2]
  345:         end,
  346:     Config =
  347: 	case proplists:get_value(group,Config2) of
  348: 	    erlang_server ->
  349: 		{_,Host, Port} = proplists:get_value(sftpd, Config2),
  350: 		{ok, ChannelPid, Connection} =
  351: 		    ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host, Port,
  352: 					   [{user, User},
  353: 					    {password, Passwd},
  354: 					    {user_interaction, false},
  355: 					    {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  356:                                             {save_accepted_host, false}
  357: 					    | PktSzOpt
  358: 					   ]
  359: 					  ),
  360: 		Sftp = {ChannelPid, Connection},
  361: 		[{sftp, Sftp}, {watchdog, Dog} | Config2];
  362: 	    openssh_server when Case == links ->
  363: 		{skip, "known bug in openssh"};
  364: 	    openssh_server ->
  365:                 PrepareOpenSSHServer();
  366:             _ when Case == read_6GB_prepare_openssh_server ->
  367:                 PrepareOpenSSHServer()
  368: 	end,
  369:     case catch proplists:get_value(remote_tar,Config) of
  370: 	%% The 'catch' is for the case of Config={skip,...}
  371: 	true ->
  372: 	    %% Provide a ChannelPid independent of the sftp-channel already opened.
  373: 	    {ok,ChPid2} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(proplists:get_value(connection,Config)),
  374: 	    [{channel_pid2,ChPid2} | Config];
  375: 	_ ->
  376: 	    Config
  377:     end.
  378: 
  379: end_per_testcase(sftp_nonexistent_subsystem, Config) ->
  380:     Config;
  381: end_per_testcase(rename_file, Config) ->
  382:     NewFileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  383:     file:delete(NewFileName),  
  384:     end_per_testcase(Config);
  385: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  386:     end_per_testcase(Config).
  387: 
  388: end_per_testcase(Config) ->
  389:     {Sftp, Connection} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  390:     ok = ssh_sftp:stop_channel(Sftp),
  391:     catch ssh_sftp:stop_channel(proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config)),
  392:     ok = ssh:close(Connection).
  393: 
  394: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  395: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  396: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  397: open_close_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  398:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  399:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  400:     ct:log("FileName     = ~p~nSftpFileName = ~p", [FileName, SftpFileName]),
  401:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  402: 
  403:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read]),
  404:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write]),
  405:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write, creat]),
  406:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write, trunc]),
  407:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [append]),
  408:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read, binary]).
  409: 
  410: open_close_file(Server, File, Mode) ->
  411:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Server, File, Mode),
  412:     ok = ssh_sftp:close(Server, Handle).
  413: 
  414: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  415: open_close_dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  416:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  417:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  418:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  419:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  420:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  421: 
  422:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:opendir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  423:     ok = ssh_sftp:close(Sftp, Handle),
  424:     {error, _} =  ssh_sftp:opendir(Sftp, SftpFileName).
  425: 
  426: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  427: read_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  428:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  429:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  430:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  431:     {ok, Data} = ssh_sftp:read_file(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  432:     {ok, Data} = ssh_sftp:read_file(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  433:     {ok, Data} = file:read_file(FileName).
  434: 
  435: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  436: read_dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  437:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  438:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  439: 
  440:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  441:     {ok, Files} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  442:     ct:log("sftp list dir: ~p~n", [Files]).
  443: 
  444: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  445: write_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  446:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  447:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  448:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  449:     Data = proplists:get_value(data, Config),
  450:     Expected = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  451:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [Data]),
  452:     {ok, Expected} = file:read_file(FileName).
  453: 
  454: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  455: write_file_iolist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  456:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  457:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  458:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  459: 
  460:     Data = proplists:get_value(data, Config),
  461:     DataB = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  462:     lists:foreach(
  463:       fun(D) ->
  464: 	      ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [D]),
  465: 	      Expected = try iolist_to_binary(D)
  466:                          catch _:_ -> unicode:characters_to_binary(D)
  467: 			 end,
  468: 	      {ok, Expected} = file:read_file(FileName)
  469:       end,
  470:       [Data, [Data,Data], [[Data],[Data]], [[[Data]],[[[[Data]],Data]]],
  471:        [[[[Data]],Data],DataB],
  472:        [[[[Data]],Data],[[DataB],[[DataB]]]]
  473:       ]).
  474: 
  475: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  476: write_big_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  477:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  478:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  479:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  480: 
  481:     Data = [lists:duplicate(750000,"a"),
  482:             proplists:get_value(data, Config)],
  483:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, Data),
  484:     Expected = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  485:     {ok, Expected} = file:read_file(FileName).
  486: 
  487: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  488: sftp_read_big_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  489:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  490:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  491:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  492: 
  493:     Data = [lists:duplicate(750000,"a"),
  494:             proplists:get_value(data, Config)],
  495:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, Data),
  496:     Expected = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  497:     {ok, Expected} = ssh_sftp:read_file(Sftp, SftpFileName).
  498: 
  499: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  500: remove_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  501:     PrivDir =  proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  502:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  503:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  504:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  505:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  506: 
  507:     {ok, Files} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  508:     true = lists:member(filename:basename(FileName), Files),
  509:     ok = ssh_sftp:delete(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  510:     {ok, NewFiles} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  511:     false = lists:member(filename:basename(FileName), NewFiles),
  512:     {error, no_such_file} = ssh_sftp:delete(Sftp, SftpFileName).
  513: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  514: rename_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  515:     PrivDir =  proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  516:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  517:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  518:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  519:     NewFileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  520:     SftpNewFileName = w2l(Config, NewFileName),
  521: 
  522:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  523:     {ok, Files} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  524:     ct:log("FileName: ~p, Files: ~p~n", [FileName, Files]),
  525:     true = lists:member(filename:basename(FileName), Files),
  526:     false = lists:member(filename:basename(NewFileName), Files),
  527:     ok = ssh_sftp:rename(Sftp, SftpFileName, SftpNewFileName),
  528:     {ok, NewFiles} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  529:     ct:log("FileName: ~p, Files: ~p~n", [FileName, NewFiles]),
  530: 
  531:     false = lists:member(filename:basename(FileName), NewFiles),
  532:     true = lists:member(filename:basename(NewFileName), NewFiles).
  533: 
  534: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  535: mk_rm_dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  536:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  537:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  538:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  539: 
  540:     DirName = filename:join(PrivDir, "test"),
  541:     SftpDirName = w2l(Config, DirName),
  542:     ok = ssh_sftp:make_dir(Sftp, SftpDirName),
  543:     ok = ssh_sftp:del_dir(Sftp, SftpDirName),
  544:     NewDirName = filename:join(PrivDir, "foo/bar"),
  545:     SftpNewDirName = w2l(Config, NewDirName),
  546:     {error, _} = ssh_sftp:make_dir(Sftp, SftpNewDirName),
  547:     {error, _} = ssh_sftp:del_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir).
  548: 
  549: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  550: links(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  551:     case os:type() of
  552: 	{win32, _} ->
  553: 	    {skip, "Links are not fully supported by windows"};
  554: 	_ ->
  555: 	    {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  556: 	    FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  557:             SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  558: 	    LinkFileName = proplists:get_value(linktest, Config),
  559:             SftpLinkFileName = w2l(Config, LinkFileName),
  560: 
  561: 	    ok = ssh_sftp:make_symlink(Sftp, SftpLinkFileName, SftpFileName),
  562: 	    {ok, FileName} = ssh_sftp:read_link(Sftp, SftpLinkFileName)
  563:     end.
  564: 
  565: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  566: retrieve_attributes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  567:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  568:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  569:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  570:     {ok, SftpFileInfo} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  571:     {ok, FileFileInfo} = file:read_file_info(FileName),
  572:     ct:log("ssh_sftp:read_file_info(): ~p~n"
  573:            "file:read_file_info(): ~p",
  574:            [SftpFileInfo, FileFileInfo]),
  575:     {ExpectedUid, ExpectedGid} =
  576:         case {os:type(), proplists:get_value(group,Config)} of
  577:             {{win32, _}, openssh_server} ->
  578:                 %% Windows compiled Erlang is expected will return 0;
  579:                 %% but when Erlang(Windows) client interacts with
  580:                 %% OpenSSH server - value 1000 is received by client
  581:                 %% over SFTP (because OpenSSH is compiled for Linux
  582:                 %% and runs on WSL)
  583:                 {1000, 1000};
  584:             _ ->
  585:                 {FileFileInfo#file_info.uid, FileFileInfo#file_info.gid}
  586:         end,
  587:     ?assertEqual(ExpectedUid, SftpFileInfo#file_info.uid),
  588:     ?assertEqual(ExpectedGid, SftpFileInfo#file_info.gid),
  589:     ok.
  590: 
  591: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  592: set_attributes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  593:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  594:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  595:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  596:     {ok,Fd} = file:open(FileName, write),
  597:     io:put_chars(Fd,"foo"),
  598:     TestWriting =
  599:         fun(FInfo) ->
  600:                 ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName,
  601:                                               FInfo#file_info{mode=8#400}),
  602:                 {error, eacces} = file:write_file(FileName, "hello again"),
  603:                 ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName,
  604:                                               FInfo#file_info{mode=8#600}),
  605:                 ok = file:write_file(FileName, "hello again")
  606:         end,
  607:     TestWriting(#file_info{}),
  608:     IsErlangServer =
  609:         fun() ->
  610:                 TcGroupPath = proplists:get_value(tc_group_path, Config),
  611:                 {_, Path} = lists:unzip(lists:flatten(TcGroupPath)),
  612:                 lists:member(erlang_server, Path)
  613:         end,
  614:     case IsErlangServer() of
  615:         true ->
  616:             ct:log("Testing with writing a complete #file_info record"),
  617:             {ok, FileInfo} = file:read_file_info(SftpFileName),
  618:             TestWriting(FileInfo);
  619:         _ ->
  620:             %% with OpenSSH daemon started by other user above instruction end
  621:             %% up with permission denied
  622:             ok
  623:     end,
  624:     ok.
  625: 
  626: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  627: file_owner_access(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  628:     case os:type() of
  629:         {win32, _} ->
  630:             {skip, "Not a relevant test on Windows"};
  631:         _ ->
  632:             FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  633:             SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  634:             {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  635: 
  636:             {ok, #file_info{mode = InitialMode}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, FileName),
  637: 
  638:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=8#000}),
  639:             {ok, #file_info{access = none}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  640: 
  641:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=8#400}),
  642:             {ok, #file_info{access = read}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  643: 
  644:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=8#200}),
  645:             {ok, #file_info{access = write}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  646: 
  647:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=8#600}),
  648:             {ok, #file_info{access = read_write}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  649: 
  650:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=InitialMode}),
  651: 
  652:             ok
  653:     end.
  654: 
  655: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  656: async_read(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  657:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  658: 
  659:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  660:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  661:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read]),
  662:     {async, Ref} = ssh_sftp:aread(Sftp, Handle, 20),
  663: 
  664:     receive
  665: 	{async_reply, Ref, {ok, Data}} ->
  666: 	    ct:log("Data: ~p~n", [Data]),
  667: 	    ok;
  668: 	Msg ->
  669: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  670:     after 
  671: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  672:     end.
  673: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  674: async_write(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  675:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  676:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  677:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  678:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write]),
  679:     Data = proplists:get_value(data, Config),
  680:     Expected = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  681:     {async, Ref} = ssh_sftp:awrite(Sftp, Handle, Data),
  682: 
  683:     receive
  684: 	{async_reply, Ref, ok} ->
  685: 	    {ok, Expected} = file:read_file(FileName);
  686: 	Msg ->
  687: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  688:     end.
  689: 
  690: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  691: position(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  692:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  693:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  694:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  695: 
  696:     Data = list_to_binary("1234567890"),
  697:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, Data),
  698:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read]),
  699: 
  700:     {ok, 3} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, {bof, 3}),
  701:     {ok, "4"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  702: 
  703:     {ok, 10} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, eof),
  704:     eof = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  705: 
  706:     {ok, 6} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, {bof, 6}),
  707:     {ok, "7"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  708: 
  709:     {ok, 9} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, {cur, 2}),
  710:     {ok, "0"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  711: 
  712:     {ok, 0} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, bof),
  713:     {ok, "1"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  714: 
  715:     {ok, 1} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, cur),
  716:     {ok, "2"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1).
  717: 
  718: read_6GB(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  719:     ct:timetrap(test_server:minutes(20)),
  720:     FileName = "/dev/zero",
  721:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  722:     {SftpChannel, _ConnectionRef} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  723:     ChunkSize = 65535,
  724:     N = 100000,
  725:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(SftpChannel, SftpFileName, [read]),
  726:     ExpectedList = lists:duplicate(ChunkSize, 0),
  727:     [begin
  728:          MBTransferred = io_lib:format("~.2f", [I * ChunkSize / 1048576.0]),
  729:          case ssh_sftp:read(SftpChannel, Handle, ChunkSize, timer:minutes(1)) of
  730:              {ok, ExpectedList} ->
  731:                  [ct:log("~n~s MB read~n", [MBTransferred]) || I rem 10000 == 0];
  732:              Result ->
  733:                  ct:log("## After reading ~s MB~n## Unexpected result received = ~p",
  734:                         [MBTransferred, Result]),
  735:                  ct:fail(unexpected_reason)
  736:          end
  737:      end ||
  738:         I <- lists:seq(0, N)],
  739:     ok.
  740: 
  741: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  742: pos_read(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  743:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  744:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  745:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  746:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_pos, Config),
  747:     [Expect1,Expect2] = Es = [binary_to_list(unicode:characters_to_binary(D)) || D <- Data],
  748:     [Len1,Len2] = [length(E) || E <- Es],
  749:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, Data),
  750: 
  751:     {ok,Read} = file:read_file(FileName),
  752:     ct:log("File: <~ts>~n<~p>~nExpect1: <~p>~nExpect2: <~p>", [Read, Read, Expect1, Expect2]),
  753: 
  754:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read]),
  755:     {async,Ref} = ssh_sftp:apread(Sftp, Handle, {bof, Len1}, Len2),
  756: 
  757:     receive
  758: 	{async_reply, Ref, {ok,Expect2}} ->
  759: 	    ok;
  760: 	Msg ->
  761: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  762:     after 
  763: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  764:     end,
  765: 
  766:    {ok,Expect1} = ssh_sftp:pread(Sftp, Handle, {bof,0}, Len1).
  767: 
  768: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  769: pos_write(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  770:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  771:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  772:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  773: 
  774:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write]),
  775: 
  776:     Data = list_to_binary("Bye,"),
  777:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [Data]),
  778: 
  779:     NewData = list_to_binary(" see you tomorrow"),
  780:     {async, Ref} = ssh_sftp:apwrite(Sftp, Handle, {bof, 4}, NewData),
  781:     receive
  782: 	{async_reply, Ref, ok} ->
  783: 	    ok;
  784: 	Msg ->
  785: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  786:     after 
  787: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  788:     end,
  789: 
  790:     LastData = proplists:get_value(data, Config),
  791:     ok = ssh_sftp:pwrite(Sftp, Handle, eof, LastData),
  792: 
  793:     NewData1 = unicode:characters_to_binary("Bye, see you tomorrow" ++ LastData),
  794:     {ok, NewData1} = ssh_sftp:read_file(Sftp, SftpFileName).
  795: 
  796: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  797: start_channel_sock(Config) ->
  798:     LoginOpts =
  799: 	case proplists:get_value(group,Config) of
  800: 	    erlang_server -> 
  801: 		[{user,     proplists:get_value(user, Config)},
  802: 		 {password, proplists:get_value(passwd, Config)}];
  803: 	    openssh_server ->
  804: 		[] % Use public key
  805: 	end,
  806: 
  807:     Opts = [{user_interaction, false},
  808: 	    {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  809:             {save_accepted_host, false}
  810: 	    | LoginOpts],
  811: 
  812:     {Host,Port} = proplists:get_value(peer, Config),
  813: 
  814:     %% Get a tcp socket
  815:     {ok, Sock} = ssh_test_lib:gen_tcp_connect(Host, Port, [{active,false}]),
  816: 
  817:     %% and open one channel on one new Connection
  818:     {ok, ChPid1, Conn} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Sock, Opts),
  819:     
  820:     %% Test that the channel is usable
  821:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  822:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  823: 
  824:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid1, SftpFileName, [read]),
  825:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid1, SftpFileName, [write]),
  826: 
  827:     %% Try to open a second channel on the Connection
  828:     {ok, ChPid2} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Conn, Opts),
  829:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid1, SftpFileName, [read]),
  830:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid2, SftpFileName, [read]),
  831: 
  832:     %% Test that the second channel still works after closing the first one
  833:     ok = ssh_sftp:stop_channel(ChPid1),
  834:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid2, SftpFileName, [write]),
  835:     
  836:     %% Test the Connection survives that all channels are closed
  837:     ok = ssh_sftp:stop_channel(ChPid2),
  838:     {ok, ChPid3} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Conn, Opts),
  839:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid3, SftpFileName, [write]),
  840:     
  841:     %% Test that a closed channel really is closed
  842:     {error, closed} = ssh_sftp:open(ChPid2, SftpFileName, [write]),
  843:     ok = ssh_sftp:stop_channel(ChPid3),
  844: 
  845:     %% Test that the socket is closed when the Connection closes
  846:     ok = ssh:close(Conn),
  847:     timer:sleep(400), %% Until the stop sequence is fixed
  848:     {error,_} = inet:getopts(Sock, [active]),
  849: 
  850:     ok.
  851: 
  852: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  853: sftp_nonexistent_subsystem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  854:     {_,Host, Port} =  proplists:get_value(sftpd, Config),
  855:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  856:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  857:     {error,"server failed to start sftp subsystem"} =
  858: 	ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host, Port,
  859: 			       [{user_interaction, false},
  860: 				{user, User},
  861: 				{password, Passwd},
  862: 				{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  863:                                 {save_accepted_host, false}
  864:                                ]).
  865: 
  866: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  867: version_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  868:     open_close_dir(Config).
  869: 
  870: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  871: create_empty_tar(Config) ->
  872:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  873:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  874:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  875:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  876:     erl_tar:close(Handle),
  877:     {ChPid,_} = proplists:get_value(sftp,Config),
  878:     {ok, #file_info{type=regular}} =
  879: 	ssh_sftp:read_file_info(ChPid, SftpTarFileName).
  880: 
  881: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  882: files_to_tar(Config) ->
  883:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  884:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  885:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  886:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  887:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
  888:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose]),
  889:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("f2.txt",Config), "f2.txt", [verbose]),
  890:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  891:     chk_tar([F1, "f2.txt"], Config).
  892: 
  893: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  894: ascii_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar(Config) ->
  895:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  896:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  897:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  898:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  899:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("f2.txt",Config), "f2.txt", [verbose]),
  900:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  901:     chk_tar(["f2.txt"], Config).
  902: 
  903: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  904: ascii_filename_unicode_contents_to_tar(Config) ->
  905:     case proplists:get_value(tar_F3_txt, Config) of
  906: 	undefined ->
  907: 	    {skip, "Unicode test"};
  908: 	Fn ->
  909: 	    ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  910: 	    TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  911:             SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  912: 	    {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  913: 	    ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(Fn,Config), Fn, [verbose]),
  914: 	    ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  915: 	    chk_tar([Fn], Config)
  916:     end.
  917: 
  918: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  919: unicode_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar(Config) ->
  920:     case proplists:get_value(tar_F4_txt, Config) of
  921: 	undefined ->
  922: 	    {skip, "Unicode test"};
  923: 	Fn ->
  924: 	    ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  925: 	    TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  926:             SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  927: 	    {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  928: 	    ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(Fn,Config), Fn, [verbose]),
  929: 	    ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  930: 	    chk_tar([Fn], Config)
  931:     end.
  932: 
  933: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  934: big_file_to_tar(Config) ->
  935:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  936:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  937:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  938:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]), 
  939:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("big.txt",Config), "big.txt", [verbose]),
  940:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  941:     chk_tar(["big.txt"], Config).
  942: 
  943: 
  944: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  945: files_chunked_to_tar(Config) ->
  946:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  947:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  948:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  949:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  950:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
  951:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose,{chunks,2}]),
  952:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  953:     chk_tar([F1], Config).
  954: 
  955: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  956: directory_to_tar(Config) ->
  957:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  958:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  959:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  960:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  961:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("d1",Config), "d1", [verbose]),
  962:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  963:     chk_tar(["d1"], Config).
  964: 
  965: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  966: binaries_to_tar(Config) ->
  967:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  968:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  969:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  970:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  971:     Bin = <<"A binary">>,
  972:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, Bin, "b1", [verbose]),
  973:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  974:     chk_tar([{"b1",Bin}], Config).
  975: 
  976: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  977: null_crypto_tar(Config) ->
  978:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  979:     Cinit = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _SendSize=5} end,
  980:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,Bin,CState,_SendSize=5} end,
  981:     Cend = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,Bin} end,
  982:     C = {Cinit,Cenc,Cend},
  983:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  984:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  985:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,C}]),
  986:     Bin = <<"A binary">>,
  987:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
  988:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, Bin, "b1", [verbose]),
  989:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose,{chunks,2}]),
  990:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("big.txt",Config), "big.txt", [verbose,{chunks,15000}]),
  991:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  992:     chk_tar([{"b1",Bin}, F1, "big.txt"], Config).
  993: 
  994: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  995: simple_crypto_tar_small(Config) ->
  996:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  997:     Cinit = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _Size=6} end,
  998:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin),CState,_SendSize=5} end,
  999:     Cdec = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,unstuff(Bin),CState,_Size=4} end,
 1000:     Cend = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin)} end,
 1001:     C = {Cinit,Cenc,Cend},
 1002:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1003:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1004:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,C}]),
 1005:     Bin = <<"A binary">>,
 1006:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
 1007:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, Bin, "b1", [verbose]),
 1008:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose,{chunks,2}]),
 1009:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
 1010:     chk_tar([{"b1",Bin}, F1], Config, [{crypto,{Cinit,Cdec}}]).
 1011: 
 1012: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1013: simple_crypto_tar_big(Config) ->
 1014:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
 1015:     Cinit = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _SendSize=6} end,
 1016:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin),CState,_SendSize=5} end,
 1017:     Cdec = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,unstuff(Bin),CState,_SendSize=4} end,
 1018:     Cend = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin)} end,
 1019:     C = {Cinit,Cenc,Cend},
 1020:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1021:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1022:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,C}]),
 1023:     Bin = <<"A binary">>,
 1024:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
 1025:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, Bin, "b1", [verbose]),
 1026:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose,{chunks,2}]),
 1027:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("big.txt",Config), "big.txt", [verbose,{chunks,15000}]),
 1028:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
 1029:     chk_tar([{"b1",Bin}, F1, "big.txt"], Config, [{crypto,{Cinit,Cdec}}]).
 1030: 
 1031: stuff(Bin) -> << <<C,C>> || <<C>> <= Bin >>.
 1032: 
 1033: unstuff(Bin) -> << <<C>> || <<C,C>> <= Bin >>.
 1034: 
 1035: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1036: read_tar(Config) ->
 1037:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
 1038:     NameBins = lists:sort(
 1039: 		 [{"b1",<<"A binary">>},
 1040: 		  {"b2",list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(750000,"a"))}
 1041: 		 ]),
 1042:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1043:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1044:     {ok,HandleWrite} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
 1045:     [ok = erl_tar:add(HandleWrite, Bin, Name, [verbose])
 1046:      ||	{Name,Bin} <- NameBins],
 1047:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleWrite),
 1048: 
 1049:     chk_tar(NameBins, Config).
 1050: 
 1051: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1052: read_null_crypto_tar(Config) ->
 1053:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
 1054:     NameBins = lists:sort(
 1055: 		 [{"b1",<<"A binary">>},
 1056: 		  {"b2",list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(750000,"a"))}
 1057: 		 ]),
 1058:     Cinitw = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _SendSize=5} end,
 1059:     Cinitr = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _FetchSize=42} end,
 1060:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,Bin,CState,_SendSize=42*42} end,
 1061:     Cdec = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,Bin,CState,_FetchSize=19} end,
 1062:     Cendw = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,Bin} end,
 1063:     Cw = {Cinitw,Cenc,Cendw},
 1064:     Cr = {Cinitr,Cdec},
 1065: 
 1066:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1067:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1068:     {ok,HandleWrite} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,Cw}]),
 1069:     [ok = erl_tar:add(HandleWrite, Bin, Name, [verbose])
 1070:      ||	{Name,Bin} <- NameBins],
 1071:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleWrite),
 1072: 
 1073:     chk_tar(NameBins, Config, [{crypto,Cr}]).
 1074: 
 1075: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1076: read_crypto_tar(Config) ->
 1077:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
 1078:     NameBins = lists:sort(
 1079: 		 [{"b1",<<"A binary">>},
 1080: 		  {"b2",list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(750000,"a"))}
 1081: 		 ]),
 1082:     Cinitw = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _SendSize=5} end,
 1083:     Cinitr = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _FetchSize=42} end,
 1084: 
 1085:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin),CState,_SendSize=42*42} end,
 1086:     Cdec = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,unstuff(Bin),CState,_FetchSize=120} end,
 1087:     Cendw = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin)} end,
 1088:     Cw = {Cinitw,Cenc,Cendw},
 1089:     Cr = {Cinitr,Cdec},
 1090: 
 1091:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1092:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1093:     {ok,HandleWrite} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,Cw}]),
 1094:     [ok = erl_tar:add(HandleWrite, Bin, Name, [verbose])
 1095:      ||	{Name,Bin} <- NameBins],
 1096:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleWrite),
 1097: 
 1098:     chk_tar(NameBins, Config, [{crypto,Cr}]).
 1099: 
 1100: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1101: block_size_16_crypto_tar(Config) -> cipher_crypto_tar(aes_256_cbc, Config).
 1102: block_size_1_crypto_tar(Config) -> cipher_crypto_tar(aes_256_ctr, Config).
 1103: 
 1104: cipher_crypto_tar(Cipher, Config) ->
 1105:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
 1106:     NameBins = lists:sort(
 1107: 		 [{"b1",<<"A binary">>},
 1108: 		  {"b2",list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(750000,"a"))},
 1109: 		  {"d1",fn("d1",Config)}  % Dir
 1110: 		 ]),
 1111:     Key = <<"This is a 256 bit key. Boring...">>,
 1112:     Ivec0 = crypto:strong_rand_bytes(16),
 1113: 
 1114:     Cinitw = fun() -> {ok, crypto:crypto_init(Cipher,Key,Ivec0,[{encrypt,true},
 1115:                                                                 {padding,zero}])} end,
 1116:     Cinitr = fun() -> {ok, crypto:crypto_init(Cipher,Key,Ivec0,false)} end,
 1117: 
 1118:     Cenc = fun(PlainBin,State) -> 
 1119: 		   CipherBin = crypto:crypto_update(State, PlainBin),
 1120: 		   {ok, CipherBin, State}
 1121: 	   end,
 1122:     Cdec = fun(CipherBin,State) ->
 1123: 		   PlainBin = crypto:crypto_update(State, CipherBin),
 1124: 		   {ok, PlainBin, State}
 1125: 	   end,
 1126: 
 1127:     Cendw = fun(PlainBin, State) ->
 1128:                     CipherBin1 = crypto:crypto_update(State, PlainBin),
 1129:                     Sz1 = size(CipherBin1),
 1130: 		    CipherBin2 = crypto:crypto_final(State),
 1131:                     Sz2 = size(CipherBin2),
 1132: 		    {ok, <<CipherBin1:Sz1/binary, CipherBin2:Sz2/binary>>}
 1133: 	    end,
 1134: 
 1135:     Cw = {Cinitw,Cenc,Cendw},
 1136:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1137:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1138: 
 1139:     {ok,HandleWrite} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,Cw}]),
 1140:     [ok = erl_tar:add(HandleWrite, Bin, Name, [verbose]) || {Name,Bin} <- NameBins],
 1141:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleWrite),
 1142: 
 1143:     Cr = {Cinitr,Cdec},
 1144:     chk_tar(NameBins, Config, [{crypto,Cr}]).
 1145: 
 1146: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1147: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
 1148: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1149: have_unicode_support() -> (file:native_name_encoding() == utf8) andalso ("四" == [22235]).
 1150: 
 1151: 
 1152: make_data_sub_dir(Config, SubDirSrc, SubDirDst) ->
 1153:     SrcDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1154:                            SubDirSrc
 1155:                           ),
 1156:     DstDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1157:                            SubDirDst),
 1158:     ssh_test_lib:copy_recursive(SrcDir, DstDir),
 1159:     {ok,DstDir}.
 1160:     
 1161: 
 1162: prepare(Config0) ->
 1163:     SrcDir = proplists:get_value(datadir_tar,Config0),
 1164:     DstDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config0), ssh_test_lib:random_chars(10)),
 1165:     ssh_test_lib:copy_recursive(SrcDir, DstDir),
 1166:     Keys = [filename,
 1167: 	    testfile,
 1168: 	    linktest,
 1169: 	    tar_filename],
 1170:     Config1 = foldl_keydelete(Keys, Config0),
 1171:     Config2 = lists:foldl(fun({Key,Name}, ConfAcc) ->
 1172:                                   [{Key, filename:join(DstDir,Name)} | ConfAcc]
 1173: 			  end,
 1174: 			  Config1,
 1175:                           lists:zip(Keys, [proplists:get_value(K,Config0) || K<-Keys])),
 1176: 
 1177:     catch ct:log("~p:~p Prepared filenames (Key -> Value):~n~ts",
 1178:                  [?MODULE,?LINE,
 1179:                   [io_lib:format("~p -> ~ts~n", [K,V]) || {K,V} <- Config2,
 1180:                                                           lists:member(K, Keys)]]),
 1181: 
 1182:     DataDir =  proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config2),
 1183:     FilenameSrc = filename:join(DataDir, "sftp.txt"),
 1184:     FilenameDst = proplists:get_value(filename, Config2),
 1185:     {ok,_} = file:copy(FilenameSrc, FilenameDst),
 1186:     [{sftp_priv_dir,DstDir} | Config2].
 1187: 
 1188: 
 1189: foldl_keydelete(Keys, L) ->
 1190:     lists:foldl(fun(K,E) -> lists:keydelete(K,1,E) end, 
 1191: 		L,
 1192: 		Keys).
 1193: 
 1194: 
 1195: chk_tar(Items, Config) ->
 1196:     chk_tar(Items, Config, []).
 1197: 
 1198: chk_tar(Items, Config, Opts) ->
 1199:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1200:     chk_tar(Items, TarFileName, Config, Opts).
 1201: 
 1202: chk_tar(Items, TarFileName, Config, Opts)  when is_list(Opts) ->
 1203:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1204:     tar_size(TarFileName, Config),
 1205:     {ChPid,_} = proplists:get_value(sftp,Config),
 1206:     {ok,HandleRead} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid, SftpTarFileName, [read|Opts]),
 1207:     {ok,NameValueList} = erl_tar:extract(HandleRead,[memory,verbose]),
 1208:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleRead),
 1209:     case {lists:sort(expand_items(Items,Config)), lists:sort(NameValueList)} of
 1210: 	{L,L} -> 
 1211: 	    true;
 1212: 	{Expect,Actual} -> 
 1213: 	    ct:log("Expect: ~p",[Expect]), ct:log("Actual: ~p",[Actual]),
 1214: 	    case erl_tar:table(TarFileName) of
 1215: 		{ok,Names} -> ct:log("names: ~p",[Names]);
 1216: 		Other -> ct:log("~p",[Other])
 1217: 	    end,
 1218: 	    ct:log("~s",[analyze_report(Expect, Actual)]),
 1219: 	    ct:fail(bad_tar_contents)
 1220:     end.
 1221: 
 1222: analyze_report([E={NameE,BinE}|Es], [A={NameA,BinA}|As]) ->
 1223:     if
 1224: 	NameE == NameA,
 1225: 	BinE =/= BinA-> 
 1226: 	    [["Component ",NameE," differs. \n  Expected: ",BinE,"\n  Actual: ",BinA,"\n\n"]
 1227: 	     | analyze_report(Es,As)];
 1228: 
 1229: 	NameE < NameA ->
 1230: 	    [["Component ",NameE," is missing.\n\n"]
 1231: 	     | analyze_report(Es,[A|As])];
 1232: 
 1233: 	NameE > NameA ->
 1234: 	    [["Component ",NameA," is not expected.\n\n"]
 1235: 	     | analyze_report([E|Es],As)];
 1236: 	true ->
 1237: 	    analyze_report(Es, As)
 1238:     end;
 1239: analyze_report([{NameE,_BinE}|Es], []) ->
 1240:     [["Component ",NameE," missing.\n\n"] | analyze_report(Es,[])];
 1241: analyze_report([], [{NameA,_BinA}|As]) ->
 1242:     [["Component ",NameA," not expected.\n\n"] | analyze_report([],As)];
 1243: analyze_report([], []) ->
 1244:     "".
 1245: 
 1246: tar_size(TarFileName, Config) ->
 1247:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1248:     {ChPid,_} = proplists:get_value(sftp,Config),
 1249:     {ok,Data} = ssh_sftp:read_file(ChPid, SftpTarFileName),
 1250:     io:format('Tar file ~p is~n ~p bytes.~n',[TarFileName, size(Data)]).
 1251: 
 1252: expand_items(Items, Config) ->    
 1253:     lists:flatten(
 1254:       [case Item of
 1255: 	   {_Name,Bin} when is_binary(Bin) -> 
 1256: 	       Item;
 1257: 	   {Name,FileName} when is_list(FileName) ->
 1258: 	       read_item_contents(Name, fn(FileName,Config));
 1259: 	   FileName  when is_list(FileName) ->
 1260: 	       read_item_contents(FileName, fn(FileName,Config))
 1261:        end || Item <- Items]).
 1262: 
 1263: read_item_contents(ItemName, FileName) ->
 1264:     case file:read_file(FileName) of
 1265: 	{ok,Bin} ->
 1266: 	    {ItemName, Bin};
 1267: 	{error,eisdir} ->
 1268: 	    {ok,FileNames} = file:list_dir(FileName),
 1269: 	    [read_item_contents(filename:join(ItemName,Name),
 1270: 				filename:join(FileName,Name)) 
 1271: 	     || Name<-FileNames]
 1272:     end.
 1273: 
 1274: fn(Name, Config) ->
 1275:     Dir = proplists:get_value(datadir_tar, Config),
 1276:     filename:join(Dir,Name).
 1277: 
 1278: fmt_host({A,B,C,D}) -> lists:concat([A,".",B,".",C,".",D]);
 1279: fmt_host(S) -> S.
 1280: 
 1281: 
 1282: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
 1283: populate_non_unicode(Dir) ->
 1284:     file:delete("f1.txt"),
 1285:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join(Dir,"f3.txt"),
 1286:                          unicode:characters_to_binary("你好")),
 1287:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join(Dir,"F一.txt"),
 1288:                          unicode:characters_to_binary("你好")),
 1289:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join(Dir,"g四.txt"),
 1290:                          <<"How are you?">>).
 1291: 
 1292: w2l(P) ->
 1293:     ssh_test_lib:winpath_to_linuxpath(P).
 1294: 
 1295: w2l(Config, P) ->
 1296:     W2L = proplists:get_value(w2l, Config, fun(X) -> X end),
 1297:     W2L(P).
 1298: 
 1299: verify_openssh(Config) ->
 1300:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
 1301:     Host = ssh_test_lib:hostname(),
 1302:     case (catch ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host,
 1303: 				       [{user_interaction, false},
 1304: 					{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1305:                                         {save_accepted_host, false}
 1306:                                        ])) of
 1307: 	{ok, _ChannelPid, Connection} ->
 1308: 	    [{peer, {_HostName,{IPx,Portx}}}] = ssh:connection_info(Connection,[peer]),
 1309: 	    ssh:close(Connection),
 1310: 	    [{w2l, fun w2l/1},
 1311:              {peer, {fmt_host(IPx),Portx}}, {group, openssh_server} | Config];
 1312: 	{error,"Key exchange failed"} ->
 1313: 	    {skip, "openssh server doesn't support the tested kex algorithm"};
 1314: 	Other ->
 1315:             ct:log("No openssh server. Cause:~n~p~n",[Other]),
 1316: 	    {skip, "No openssh daemon (see log in testcase)"}
 1317:     end.
